title: Key Fragments
body:
I have just recently came back from an extended break (4-5 months; before the Honor Rework, Urgot's Re-release, Kayn's release, etc.), I've played 41 games across the last few days, and I've received only 1 key fragment.

Usually by this point I'd have earned 5 key fragments, and then it would reset at the end of the month, allowing me to earn them at a regular pace.

Is this bugged or intended? At this rate I'll have to play another 10-15 games just to get one more fragment, if at all?

replies.body: It might just be bad luck, but it does sound like you might have gotten more keys typically by now. Have you refreshed your client at all? Those key fragments can now pop up anytime while on the client or after logging in, so give that a try really quick!
It looks like someone debugged the system for me or something, I just got 4 fragments upon logging in. Thanks!

Nothing done on our end! As I mentioned in the first reply, that is just how key fragments work now. You won't always get them right after a match ends so it's always a good idea to close the client every once and awhile. A simple refresh could make those fragments appear.
